spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall massing loosely matches (large open area on left, bedroom zone toward top), but multiple layout deviations. Kitchen zone at top-left of plan (L-counter + island) is not represented in the 3D (E1/E2). Central service core (bath/WC/closet partitions) is reconfigured; wall runs and openings do not align with the plan (E2). Entry at bottom-right in plan is not clearly modeled as a door/opening in the correct location/orientation (E2/E3). Window distribution is substantially different: plan shows multiple openings along bottom and left edges; 3D shows different positions/sizes and fewer openings (E2). Proportions are altered: living area vs. service core widths and the bottom zone depth do not match the plan (E4).

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness appears somewhat uniform, but internal wall topology differs from the plan (E2). Door embedding is inconsistent/unclear: several plan doors (bedroom door, bathroom door, main entry) are not cleanly/accurately represented (E1/E2/E3). Adjacencies are partially preserved (living adjacent to bedroom/services), but the service rooms’ boundaries and access relationships do not match the plan (E2). Kitchen is effectively missing (E1). A distinct extra sleeping/furniture zone at the bottom-left reads like an added room/bed area not present in the plan (E5).

furniture_mapping.notes: Living room furniture does not correspond to the plan (plan shows sofa at bottom-left and dining near center-left; 3D shows two armchairs and different arrangement) (E2). Kitchen fixtures/appliances and island from the plan are missing (E1). Furniture scale is generally plausible but does not reflect the plan’s intended layout and zoning (E2).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric camera is acceptable and readable. Projection is not strictly orthographic (slight perspective feel). Lighting is clean and evenly exposed. Geometry is mostly clean, but some openings/doorways and interior partitions look simplified and ambiguous relative to architectural elements (E6). Overall composition is clear but lacks key architectural details (kitchen/doors/windows) that reduce interpretability.

detected_errors.description: Kitchen fixtures (L-shaped counter run and island shown in the 2D plan) are missing in the 3D render.
Central service core (bath/WC/closet/hall partitions) is re-laid out; wall alignments do not match the 2D plan.
Main entry location at bottom-right (2D) is not accurately represented/legible in the 3D model.
Door orientations/clear openings (bedroom door, bathroom door, entry) do not match the swing/placement implied by the 2D plan.
Window placement/count differs substantially: multiple bottom-edge openings in the plan are not present or are relocated/resized in the 3D.
Room proportion distortion: relative sizes of living area, service core, and bottom zone differ from the 2D plan.
Hallucinated sleeping/furniture zone at the bottom-left reads as an added room/bed area not shown in the 2D plan.
Rendering/modeling simplification artifacts: ambiguous door openings and simplified partition terminations reduce architectural correctness.
